attributes.action: Extend the 30 hours free childcare to cover children under 3 years old.
attributes.additional_details: Families who want to return to work are often unable due to the cost of childcare. Children aged 3 and over already get 30 hours free childcare. Extending this to include younger ages will allow families to return to work.
attributes.background: Extend the 30 hours free childcare to include younger ages.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550625
